attributes.action: speed cameras on Kingsway Rochdale Lancs
attributes.additional_details:
Put up speed cameras on Kingsway Rochdale OL16 inbetween The Range & Morrisons.
Most vehicles speed early morning and late evenings every day especially when the lights are on green at both The Range & Morrisons.
Weve seen speeding & racing vehicles.
This must stop now. Put up working speed cameras now.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
